To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Recordings of phone interviews with various artists hosted by Al Rosen and Skip Woolwine. Recording features: Louise Mandrell, John Conlee, Jim Ed Brown, Ronnie McDowell, George Strait, Bill Anderson, David Wills, Sylvia, Randy Owen, and Ricky Skaggs. Item is listed as part 1 of the Nashville Radio Review artist interviews.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
